aircraft.value: Skyhawk Fighter - AC-7177-307 at Training Center Beta

defect_observed.value: Fuel pump bearing wear beyond limits. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 09/04/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 10/04/2024 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 12/04/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 16/04/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 19/04/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Fuel pump bearing wear beyond limits. Abnormality observed during system test.

a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
